summary.span: 提供用于浏览对象属性的用户界面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for browsing the properties of an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用属性网格，你创建的新实例类在父控件上，然后设置到要显示的属性的对象。To use the property grid, you create a new instance of the class on a parent control and set to the object to display the properties for. 在网格中显示的信息是在对象分配的时间属性的快照。The information displayed in the grid is a snapshot of the properties at the time the object is assigned. 如果指定的对象的属性值更改在运行时代码中，新值才会显示导致要刷新的网格的网格中执行操作。If a property value of the object specified by the is changed in code at run time, the new value is not displayed until an action is taken in the grid that causes the grid to refresh. 属性网格中的属性选项卡显示为顶部的工具栏上的按钮，并且会因而在作用域中定义。The property tabs within the property grid appear as buttons on the toolbar at the top of the , and can vary in scope as defined in the . 你可以使用属性来显示较小的大按钮而不是默认值。You can use the property to display large buttons instead of the default smaller ones. 大按钮为 32 x 32 像素，而不是标准的 16 x 16 像素。Large buttons are 32-by-32 pixels rather than the standard 16-by-16 pixels. 大型和小型按钮和属性列表扩展器图标 (加号或减号图标) 时 app.config 文件包含以下条目会根据系统 DPI 设置调整大小：The large and small buttons and the property list expander icons (the plus or minus icons) are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 在开发环境中的工具箱中未最初呈现控件。The control is not initially presented in the toolbox in the development environment. 你可以将属性网格添加到工具箱，使你可以将拖动到窗体。You can add a property grid to the toolbox, which enables you to drag a onto your form. 你还可以定义的实例通过在你的源代码中添加相应的代码。You can also define an instance of by adding the appropriate code in your source code. 所有公共属性的将显示在默认情况下。All public properties of the will be displayed in the by default. 可以隐藏属性，以便它不会显示在的修饰它与控件并将值设置为`false`。You can hide a property so that it is not displayed in the control by decorating it with the and setting the value to `false`. 你可以指定通过提供具有的类别，属性将显示在类别。You can specify the category that a property appears in by providing a category with the . 您可以为你的底部将显示的属性中提供说明性文本控件通过使用。You can provide descriptive text for your property that appears at the bottom of the control by using the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建属性网格和将其位置设置在窗体上。The following code example illustrates creating a property grid and setting its location on a form. 此示例要求你拥有的窗体具有在其上。This example requires that you have a form with a on it. [!code-cpp[Classic PropertyGrid Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyGrid Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PropertyGrid Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyGrid Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PropertyGrid Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyGrid Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将设置属性时，网格线会改变以反映当前状态的属性上的属性排序按钮的外观。When you set the property, the appearance of the property sort buttons on the grid changes to reflect the current state of the property. 设置到导致它们已检索的顺序显示的属性。Setting to causes the properties to be displayed in the order they were retrieved. 设置同时向和等同于设置到单独。Setting to both and is the same as setting to alone. 将始终显示按字母顺序分类的视图。The categorized view is always shown as alphabetical. > [!NOTE] > 若要进行自定义排序，实现上要按所需顺序返回的属性的组件。To do custom sorting, implement on the component to return the properties in the desired order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化控制使用，属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control using the , properties. 此外，此示例设置控件的属性`false`以便网格时运行该示例将不可见。In addition, this example sets the control's property to `false` so the grid will not be visible when the example is run. 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中的窗体和调用`InitializePropertyGrid`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializePropertyGrid` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 若要运行该窗体时，请查看属性网格，请更改该网格的属性`true`、 重新编译，并重新运行该窗体。To view the property grid when the form is running, change the grid's property to `true`, recompile, and rerun the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`PropertyGrid1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `PropertyGrid1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化控制使用，属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control using the , properties. 此外，此示例设置控件的属性`false`以便网格时运行该示例将不可见。In addition, this example sets the control's property to `false` so the grid will not be visible when the example is run. 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中的窗体和调用`InitializePropertyGrid`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理方法。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializePropertyGrid` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 若要运行该窗体时，请查看属性网格，请更改该网格的属性`true`、 重新编译，并重新运行该窗体。To view the property grid when the form is running, change the grid's property to `true`, recompile, and rerun the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性旨在提供 visual Windows 窗体控件之间的兼容性，呈现文本使用类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]应用程序执行自定义文本呈现使用类。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不正在升级从[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，因此，建议你停`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本效果更好，并提高的国际字体支持。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于类用于执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算字符间距和自动换行从的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用类呈现文本中，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本显示不同于应用程序中的其他文本。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决此不兼容性，你可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性`true`对特定的控件。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用方法的参数替换`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.
